documentation.text: This is the base class of a metaverse plug-in.
The metaverse that will own this plug-in.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "MetaversePlugin: the owner contract must not be 0"

arguments.value: MetaversePlugin: the owner contract must not be 0

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "MetaversePlugin: the owner contract must not be 0"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "MetaversePlugin: the owner contract must implement IMetaverseRegistrar"

arguments.value: MetaversePlugin: the owner contract must implement IMetaverseRegistrar

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "MetaversePlugin: the owner contract must implement IMetaverseRegistrar"

documentation.text:
Creating a metaverse plug-in requires a valid metaverse
 registrar as its owner.

This function holds an implementation (which could be
 empty) for when the plugin is added to the metaverse.

This function returns the uri for a given token id, with
 the same semantics of ERC1155.

This function is a hook for when an asset, which exists
 as registered & managed by this contract, is burned by
 its owner.

documentation.text:
Creating a metaverse plug-in requires a valid metaverse
 registrar as its owner.

This function holds an implementation (which could be
 empty) for when the plugin is added to the metaverse.

This function returns the uri for a given token id, with
 the same semantics of ERC1155.

This function is a hook for when an asset, which exists
 as registered & managed by this contract, is burned by
 its owner.

burned(address,uint256,uint256).notice: This function is a hook for when an asset, which exists as registered & managed by this contract, is burned by its owner.

constructor.notice: Creating a metaverse plug-in requires a valid metaverse registrar as its owner.

initialize().notice: This function holds an implementation (which could be empty) for when the plugin is added to the metaverse.

metaverse().notice: The metaverse that will own this plug-in.

uri(uint256).notice: This function returns the uri for a given token id, with the same semantics of ERC1155.
